title: Disappearance of body parts in the Refine Tracklets GUI
body:
Hello again, and many thanks for this amazing software!

(my operating system and dlc version:) Windows 10, Anaconda 3 Env (GPU)  & DeepLabCut 2.2b6 (multi)

The issue I'm dealing with occurs when opening the GUI in the Refine Tracklets tab. I have one animal with 9 body parts, but when I open the GUI I can only see 4 of the body parts (see picture below:)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/59688604/88919684-36768e00-d274-11ea-9cd0-85cfff06195d.png)

I will mention that I did try to play around with the tracking parameters in the inference_cfg.yaml file as suggested in similar discussions, but nothing seems to change the GUI.  
Attached below are the inference_cfg.yaml and config.yaml information:

```
addlikelihoods: 0.15
averagescore: 0.1
boundingboxslack: 0
detectionthresholdsquare: 0
distnormalization: 1000
distnormalizationLOWER: 0
iou_threshold: 0.2
lowerbound_factor: 0.5
max_age: 100
method: m1
min_hits: 3
minimalnumberofconnections: 0
pafthreshold: 0.1
topktoretain: 1
upperbound_factor: 1.25
variant: 0
withid: false
```

```
    # Project definitions (do not edit)
Task: multianimal_test
scorer: ornaim
date: Jul8
multianimalproject: true
    # Project path (change when moving around)
project_path: C:\Users\orna\Desktop\dlc_projects\multianimal_test-ornaim-2020-07-08
    # Annotation data set configuration (and individual video cropping parameters)
video_sets:
  C:\Users\orna\Desktop\dlc_projects\multianimal_test-ornaim-2020-07-08\videos\trimmed-small.avi:
    crop: 0, 720, 0, 480
individuals:
- mouse
uniquebodyparts: []
multianimalbodyparts:
- snout
- whisker1
- whisker2
- whisker3
- right_hand
- left_thumb
- left_finger
- leg
- back
skeleton:
- - snout
  - whisker1
- - left_finger
  - back
- - right_hand
  - back
- - left_thumb
  - left_finger
- - snout
  - whisker3
- - snout
  - back
- - leg
  - back
- - snout
  - whisker2
- - left_thumb
  - back
bodyparts: MULTI!
start: 0
stop: 1
numframes2pick: 120
    # Plotting configuration
skeleton_color: white
pcutoff: 0.6
dotsize: 12
alphavalue: 0.5
colormap: Set1
    # Training,Evaluation and Analysis configuration
TrainingFraction:
- 0.95
iteration: 0
default_net_type: resnet_50
default_augmenter: multi-animal-imgaug
snapshotindex: -1
```

Thanks!
